schedule_id.description: ID of schedule associated with thermostat or null if schedule is not associated.

overheat_protection.description: Algorithm that disables heating if temperature is higher than target.

enabled.description: Enables or disables overheat protection algorithm.

range.description:
A value above target temperature that triggers overheat protection.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

maximum_humidity.description:
This parameter controls how high the relative humidity can be when cooling is active, once relative humidity exceeds this value cooling will stop to prevent condensation.
Unit: rH% with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

enabled.description: Indicates if dew point control in cooling is enabled. If enabled cooling will be stopped if supply temperature drops below calculated dew point temperature plus offset. Maximum humidity control works if dew point control is disabled.

offset.description:
Offset which is added to dew point temperature to set threshold for supply temperature below which cooling is disabled.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

hysteresis.description:
Hysteresis for dew point control threshold.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

sigma_control.description: Algorithm that smoothly controls radiator valve opening.

enabled.description: Sigma smooth control state. If disabled, opening value of actuator will jump between min/max instead of smooth control.

range.description:
Temperature range below target temperature that is used to scale opening from 100 ( or maximum opening) - 0 (or minimum opening) percent when current room temperature is equal to target temperature. Sigma causes actuators to open/close in small, smooth steps instead of full open/full close.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

opening_factor.description:
Current calculated valve opening factor in percent used to scale desired opening between min and max.
Unit: %.

use_for_heating.description: Configures whether radiator actuators should be controlled (opening and closing) while heating or not (always closed).

use_for_cooling.description: Configures whether radiator actuators should be controlled (opening and closing) while cooling or not (always closed).

emergency_opening.description: Configures emergency opening level while temperature sensor is broken or not available e.g offline.

floor_control.description: Algorithm that controls floor heating processes.

enabled.description: Floor control state.

lower_target_temperature.description:
Lower limit of floor temperature fluctuation (due to material inertia). Could not be greater than upper value.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

upper_target_temperature.description:
Upper limit of floor temperature fluctuation (due to material inertia). Could not be less than lower value.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

hysteresis.description:
Damper factor, which will protect from continuous on/off switching when current temperature is near target value.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

condition.description: Floor control condition. Informs whether floor temperature is in min-max range or not.

room_temperature_sensor.description: Required. Temperature sensor used by thermostats basic algorithm.

floor_temperature_sensor.description: Optional. Temperature sensor used by thermostats floor heating control algorithm.

humidity_sensor.description: Optional. Humidity sensor used by thermostats cooling algorithm.

temperature_regulator.description: Optional. Temperature regulator used to control target temperature.

radiator_actuators.description: Optional. Radiator actuators used by thermostat sigmal control algorithm.

relays.description: Optional. Relay actuators used by thermostat basic algorithm.

heating_relays.description: Optional. Relay actuators used by thermostat basic algorithm when mode is heating.

cooling_relays.description: Optional. Relay actuators used by thermostat basic algorithm when mode is cooling.

opening_sensors.description: Optional. If there is atleast one window sensor (opening sensor) associated, thermostat will stop heating/cooling as soon as window gets opened.

two_state_input_sensors.description: Optional. If there is atleast one two state input sensor associated, thermostat will stop heating/cooling as soon as any sensor state is set to false.

supply_temperature_sensor.description: Optional. Supply temperature sensor used by dew point control algorithm.

ir_heaters.description: Optional. IR heaters used by thermostat basic algorithm when mode is heating.

antifrost_protection.description: State of algorithm that turns on heating if temperature drops under antifrost_protection_temperature.

antifrost_protection_temperature.description:
Threshold for antifrost protection algorithm.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

opening_sensors_delay.description:
Delay after which thermsotat will react when opening sensor detects window openned.
Unit: seconds

is_window_open.description: Informs whether there is window opened.

confirm_time_mode.description: Mainly for Mobile/Web App purposes. Indicates if time mode modal should be displayed when changing thermostat temperature.

dew_point.description:
Dew point calculated based on room temperature sensor and humidity. Available when room temperature sensor and humidity sensor assigned and online with valid values.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

floor_dew_point.description:
Dew point calculated based on floor temperature sensor and humidity. Available when floor temperature sensor and humidity sensor assigned and online with valid values.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

enabled.description: Enable or disable device.

propagation_delay.description:
Delays active state propagation for output devices eg. delays switching from off to on for relays/pellet boiler when heat is requested. Useful for setup with gas boiler (quick achieve of heating setpoint) and radiator actuators (long response, up to several minutes) where boiler can go into alarm status when there is no heat extraction.
Unit: seconds.

associations.description: Physical/Virtual devices associated to thermostat output group.

thermostats.description: Required. Thermostat devices used by output group as input device.

relays.description: Optional. Relay actuators used by thermostat output group as output devices for heating/cooling sources or valve actuators. Will be turned on whenever there is heating or cooling required.

heating_relays.description: Optional. Relay actuators used by thermostat output group as output devices for heating sources or valve actuators. Will be turned on only if there is heating required.

cooling_relays.description: Optional. Relay actuators used by thermostat output group as output devices for cooling sources or valve actuators. Will be turned on only if there is cooling required.

pellet_boilers.description: Optional. Pellet boilers used by thermostat output group as output devices.

heat_pumps.description: Optional. Heat pumps used by thermostat output group as output devices.

two_state_input_sensor.description: Optional. Two State Input Sensor which will control associated Thermostat heating/cooling modes automatically.

circuit_pumps.description: Optional. Relay actuators used by thermostat output group as output devices for heating/cooling sources or circuit pumps actuators. Will be turned on whenever there is heating or cooling required. Use antistop function from Thermostat Output Group.

valves.description: Optional. Valves used by thermostat output group as output devices.

pump_antistop.description: Antistop settings. Function to automatically turn on circuit pump when it was not turned on for a long time.

enabled.description: Indicates if antistop function is turned on.

work_time.description:
Turn on time for pump if antistop active.
Unit: seconds.

pause_time.description:
Tells how long pump should be turned off before turned on by antistop.
Unit: hours

enabled.description: Enable or disable device. Lua code wont be executed when disabled.

blocked.description:
Indicates whether device is blocked by its author.
**NOTE:** Blocked device cannot be modified and returns empty lua code via REST api.

uuid.description: Unique identifier of custom device in the marketplace.

version.description:
Defined by author version of custom device.
**NOTE**: Has to fulfill regex: `^[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}$`

lua.description: Device logic representation in lua language. (script used to perform actions, catch events etc)
lua.example:
function CustomDevice:onMyButtonPress(element) print("HELLO") end
function CustomDevice:onMySwitcherChange(newValue, element) print("HELLO") end
function CustomDevice:onMyTextChange(newValue, element) print("HELLO") end
function CustomDevice:onMyProgressBarChange(newValue, element) print("HELLO") end
function CustomDevice:onMySliderChange(newValue, element) print("HELLO") end

components.description: Custom device components (internal http, mqtt, ws and modbus clients, variables & timers) collection

blockade_pin_code_enabled.description:
Indicates whether device is blocked with pin by its author.
**NOTE:** Blocked device can be modified and deleted only using assigned pin code provided in URL parameters when sending request for `pin_code` parameter.

blockade_pin_code.description: Pin code used to modify or delete device when pin blockade enabled.

variant_device.description: Variant properties when non generic variant.

integration_model.description: User defined model of custom device integration.

integration_version.description: User defined version of custom device integration.

integration_uid.description: User defined unique identifier of custom device integration.

bannable.description: Indicates if the custom device can be set as banned.

ban_reason.description: Contains error message which resulted in ban.

error_counter.description: Current error counter value. (incremented on execute fail until less than max_error)

max_errors.description: Maximum error_counter value. Exceeding this value by error_counter will result in ban.

max_execution_time.description:
Maximum script execution time before terminate with error message.
Unit: seconds

cells.description: Cells in section. Not used. Empty array.

text.description: Text displayed as a section name.

text_id.description: Text identifier used to reference text from translation database.

collapsible.description: Indicates if the section should be collapsible.

collapsed_default.description: Indicates if the section should be collapsed by default. **NOTE:** Set to `true` indicates that the section is visible by default, set to `false` indicates that the section is hidden.

has_background.description: Indicates if the section should have a background displayed.

type.description: Element type description, based on role and functionality.

name.description: Element name used to reference element at lua side. Cannot contain special characters except `_`

uuid.description: Universal Unique Identifier of element used by frontend app to properly render and position element. Cannot contain special characters except `_`

enabled.description: Enable or disable element.

visibility.description:
Elements visibility state. Can has one of values:
  • `visible` - element is visible
  • `hidden_gap` - element is hidden and theres empty space at element position
  • `hidden_adjust` - element is hidden and other elements are adjusted as theres no element at all

value.description: Text displayed by element.

text_id.description: Text identifier used to reference text from translation database.

on_change.description: Function name which will be triggered when value changes. Cannot contain special characters.

value.description: Current switcher state/value.

on_change.description: Function name which will be triggered when value changes. Cannot contain special characters.

text_id.description: Text identifier used to reference text from translation database.

on_press.description: Function name which will be triggered when button pressed. Cannot contain special characters.

value.description: Current value.

on_change.description: Function name which will be triggered when value changes. Cannot contain special characters.

value.description: Current value.

on_change.description: Function name which will be triggered when value changes. Cannot contain special characters.

label_text.description:
Text that will be displayed as slider label.
Used for slider type `slider-with-label`.

label_text_id.description:
Text identifier from translation database of text that will be displayed as slider label.
Used for slider type `slider-with-label`.

unit.description:
Unit text that will be displayed for slider value.
Used for slider type `slider-with-label`.

label.description: Option label to display to user.

value.description: Option value stored in combobox `value` field. Hidden to user.

text_id.description: Text identifier used to reference text from translation database.

value.description: Currently selected option value. Has to be empty or one of values stored in options field.

on_change.description: Function name which will be triggered when value changes. Cannot contain special characters.

accepted_classes.description:
Devices classes accepted by selector.
**NOTE:** Empty array means all classes are accepted.

accepted_types.description:
Devices types accepted by selector.
**NOTE:** Empty array means all types are accepted.

allow_multiple.description: Indicates if selector accepts multiple devices.

on_change.description: Function name which will be triggered when device changes. Cannot contain special characters.

gradient_size_maximum.description: Maximum amount of colors which can be used for gradient. Required if `gradient` is in `available_color_modes`.

temperature.description:
Selected white color temperature.
**NOTE:** Available only when `color_mode` is `temperature`.

color.description:
Selected HTML/Hex RGB color.
**NOTE:** Available only when `color_mode` is `rgb`.

gradient.description:
Selected list of HTML/Hex RGB colors.
**NOTE:** Available only when `color_mode` is `gradient`.

on_state_change.description: Function name which will be triggered when state changes. Cannot contain special characters.

on_brightness_change.description: Function name which will be triggered when brightness changes. Cannot contain special characters.

on_color_change.description: Function name which will be triggered when color changes. Cannot contain special characters.

accepted_types.description:
Schedule types accepted by selector.
**NOTE:** Empty array means all types are accepted.

schedule_id.description:
Selected schedule identifier.
**NOTE:** `0` means there is no schedule selected.

on_change.description: Function name which will be triggered when schedule ID changes. Cannot contain special characters.

minimum.description: Minimum value for time count. Has to be less than `maximum`.

maximum.description: Maximum value for time count. Has to be greater than `minimum`.

days.description:
Selected days. Has to apply to `minimum` and `maximum` values.
**NOTE:** Available only when `days` is in `units`.

hours.description:
Selected hours. Has to apply to `minimum` and `maximum` values.
**NOTE:** Available only when `hours` is in `units`.

minutes.description:
Selected minutes. Has to apply to `minimum` and `maximum` values.
**NOTE:** Available only when `minutes` is in `units`.

seconds.description:
Selected seconds. Has to apply to `minimum` and `maximum` values.
**NOTE:** Available only when `seconds` is in `units`.

count.description: Time count in lowest available unit. E.g. when units are `minutes` and `seconds` count will be in seconds and when units are `hours` and `minutes` count will be in minutes.

on_change.description: Function name which will be triggered when time changes. Cannot contain special characters.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.DatePicker.D.description: Single date representation in date picker.

date_type.description: Indicates if picker holds single and range of dates.

date.description: Picked date. **NOTE:** Available only when `date_type` is `single`.

range.description: Picked range of dates. **NOTE:** Available only when `date_type` is `range`.

from.description: Start date. Has to be lower or equal to `to` date.

to.description: End date. Has to be higher or equal to `from` date.

on_change.description: Function name which will be triggered when time changes. Cannot contain special characters.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.ElementComma.description:
Command: `press`.
Triggers button press event.
Body is ignored.

Command: `set_text`.
Calls Element to change text to the desired value.
Body is required.

Command: `set_text_id`.
Calls Element to change text_id to the desired value.
Body is required.

set_text_id.description: Text identifier used to reference text from translation database.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.ElementComma.description:
Command: `set_icon`.
Calls Element to change icon to the desired value.
Body is required.

Command: `set_value`.
Calls Element to change value.
Body is required.

Command: `increment`.
Calls Element to increment value by 1.
Body is ignored.

Command: `decrement`.
Calls Element to decrement value by 1.
Body is ignored.

Command: `set_value`.
Calls Element to change value.
Body is required.

Command: `increment`.
Calls Element to increment value by single step value.
Body is ignored.

Command: `decrement`.
Calls Element to decrement value by single step value.
Body is ignored.

Command: `set_value`.
Calls Element to change value.
Body is required.

Command: `toggle`.
Calls Element to toggle value.
Body is ignored.

Command: `set_value`.
Calls Element to change value.
Body is required.

Command: `set_text_id`.
Calls Element to change text_id to the desired value.
Body is required.

set_text_id.description: Text identifier used to reference text from translation database.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.ElementComma.description:
Command: `set_font_size`.
Calls Element to change font_size value.
Body is required.

Command: `set_font_weight`.
Calls Element to change font_weight value.
Body is required.

Command: `set_icon`.
Calls Element to change icon to the desired value.
Body is required.

Command: `set_value`.
Calls Element to change value to one of available options.
Body is required.

Command: `add_option`.
Calls Element to add new available option.
Body is required.

Command: `add_option`.
Calls Element to add new available option.
Body is required.
NOTE: Third argument (text_id) is optional! If not provided it will be set to 0.

Command: `remove_option_by_value`.
Calls Element to remove one of available options by value. If selected value is removed it changes to empty.
Body is required.

remove_option_by_value.description: Value of option to be removed.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.ElementComma.description:
Command: `remove_option_by_label`.
Calls Element to remove one of available options by label. If selected value is removed it changes to empty.
Body is required.

remove_option_by_label.description: Label of option to be removed.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.ElementComma.description:
Command: `remove_option_by_text_id`.
Calls Element to remove one of available options by text id. If selected value is removed it changes to empty.
Body is required.

remove_option_by_text_id.description: Text identifier used to reference text from translation database.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.ElementComma.description:
Command `clear_options`.
Calls Element to remove all available options. Changes current value to empty.
Body is ignored.

Command: `set_accepted_classes`.
Calls Element to set devices accepted classes. Values has to be unique.
Empty array means all classes are accepted.
Body is required.

Command: `set_accepted_types`.
Calls Element to set devices accepted types. Values has to be unique.
Empty array means all types are accepted.
Body is required.

Command `select_device`.
Calls Element to select current device. It has to has class and type accepted by selector.
**NOTE:** If selector accepts multiple devices this command adds passed device to array of selected ones instead of replacing.
Body is required.

Command `select_devices`.
Calls Element to select current devices. They have to has class and type accepted by selector.
Body is required.

Command: `toggle`.
Calls Element to toggle value of `state` property.
Body is ignored.

Command `set_state`.
Calls Element to set its current state.
Body is required.

Command `set_brightness`.
Calls Element to set its current brightness.
Body is required.

Command `set_temperature`.
Calls Element to set its current temperature.
**NOTE:** Available only when `temperature` is one of `available_color_modes`.
Body is required.

Command `set_color`.
Calls Element to set its current color.
**NOTE:** Available only when `rgb` is one of `available_color_modes`.
Body is required.

Command `set_gradient`.
Calls Element to set its current gradient colors.
**NOTE:** Available only when `gradient` is one of `available_color_modes`.
Body is required.

Command `select_schedule_id`.
Calls Element to select current schedule by its ID. It has to be of type accepted by selector.
Body is required.

Command: `set_accepted_types`.
Calls Element to set schedules accepted types. Values has to be unique.
Empty array means all types are accepted.
Body is required.

Command `set_time`.
Calls Element to set its current time.
Body is required.

Command `set_count`.
Calls Element to set its current time count.
Body is required.

Command `set_date`.
Calls Element to set its current date.
**NOTE:** Available only when `date_type` is `single`.
Body is required.

Command `set_range`.
Calls Element to set its current date range.
**NOTE:** Available only when `date_type` is `range`.
Body is required.

from.description: Start date. Has to be lower or equal to `to` date.

to.description: End date. Has to be higher or equal to `from` date.

name.description: Component name used to reference element at lua side. Cannot contain special characters except `_`

url.description: Default URL that will be used if not specified in lua script.

body.description: Default body that will be used if not specified in lua script.

headers.description: Hash Map of default headers used for every request. {Header: Value} (compliant with the HTTP specification)

query_params.description: Hash Map of default Query Parameters which are appended to every request.

client_id.description: Mqtt client identifier. Cannot contain special characters except `-` `_`

username.description: Mqtt broker authorization username (optional, may be empty)

password.description: Mqtt broker authorization password (optional, may be empty). Will always be masked when retrieving client data eg. `*******`

url.description: URL that will be to connect to server.

headers.description: List of key-value pairs with headers used while connecting to server.

query_params.description: Hash Map of Query Parameters which are appended to every request.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.ModbusRTUCli.description: Custom device Modbus RTU Client component representation.

slave_address.description: Address of slave device to which client will communicate.

baud_rate.description: Baud rate on which the slave device works.

transceiver_uuid.description: UUID of transceiver which client is using for communication.

transceiver.description: Transceiver associated to client which will be used for communication.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.ModbusTCPCli.description: Custom device Modbus TCP Client component representation.

ip_address.description: IP address of the device the client communicates with.

port.description: TCP port the device communicate on.

device_id.description: Slave Device ID. Used if target device is gateway.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.VariableBool.description: Custom device Boolean Variable component representation.

value.description: Current value of variable.

default_value.description: Default value which will be set on application load.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.VariableInte.description: Custom device Integer Variable component representation.

value.description: Current value of variable.

default_value.description: Default value which will be set on application load.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.VariableStri.description: Custom device String Variable component representation.

value.description: Current value of variable.

default_value.description: Default value which will be set on application load.

Device.VIRTUAL.CustomDevice.VariableTabl.description: Custom device Table Variable component representation.

value.description: Current value of variable.

default_value.description: Default value which will be set on application load.

meta.description: Meta information about exported custom device.

version.description: User defined version of custom device.

blocked.description: Indicates whether custom device can be modified after import.

central_version.description: Version of Sinum central which custom device was created in.

data.description: Custom device payload in base64. Encrypted when device is blocked.

charge_power.description:
Current charge power.
Unit: W, multiplied by 1000 (mW).
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `battery` or `car_charger`.

soc.description:
Current state of charge.
Unit: %
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `battery`.

energy_charged_today.description:
Amount of energy charged to the battery today.
Unit: kwh with one decimal number, multiplied by 1000 (Wh)
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `battery`.

energy_discharged_today.description:
Amount of energy consumed from the battery today.
Unit: kwh with one decimal number, multiplied by 1000 (Wh)
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `battery`.

current_temperature.description:
Current domestic hot water temperature.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `common_dhw_main`.

target_temperature.description:
Target hot water temperature for DHW or target temperature for temperature regulator.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `common_dhw_main` or `temperature_regulator`.

hysteresis.description:
Target hot water temperature hysteresis.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `common_dhw_main`.

heat_demand.description:
Domestic Hot Water heat demand.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `common_dhw_main`.

total_active_power.description:
Active power measured by energy meter.
Unit: W, multiplied by 1000 (mW).
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `energy_meter`.

energy_sum_total.description:
Energy sum (consumed + fed) of all phases lifetime.
Unit: kWh, multiplied by 1000 (Wh).
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `energy_meter`.

uses_energy_of_building.description:
Indicates if energy meter is used to measure energy of device inside the building. (Not main energy meter).
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `energy_meter`.

enabled.description:
Indicates if heat pump is enabled.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `heat_pump`.

thermal_demand.description:
Heat pump thermal demand.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `heat_pump`.

electric_heater_active.description:
Indicates electric heater activation state in heat pump.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `heat_pump`.

pv_total_active_power.description:
Current total power produced by all photovoltaic panels.
Unit: W with three decimal number, multiplied by 1000 (mW)
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `inverter`.

energy_produced_total.description:
Total amount of energy produced by PV over a lifetime.
Unit: kWh with one decimal number, multiplied by 1000 (Wh).
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `inverter`.

power_to_grid.description:
Current power fed to (positive number) or consumed from (negative number) the power grid.
Unit: W with three decimal number, multiplied by 1000 (mW)
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `inverter`.

temperature.description:
Measured temperature sensor value.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `temperature_sensor`.

state.description:
State of the output for relay or state of input for two state input sensor. On/Off.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `relay` or `two_state_input_sensor`.

time_since_state_change.description:
Time since last relay state change.
Unit: seconds.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `relay`.

target_temperature_mode.description:
Regulator target temperature mode.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `temperature_regulator`.

current.description:
Regulator target temperature mode. Specifies if regulator works in `constant` mode with one target temperature, `time_limited` mode with one temporary target temperature or according to schedule in `schedule` mode with many target temperatures in time, configured by user.
NOTE: Parameter is read only, use commands to change target temperature mode!
NOTE: Parameter cannot be `schedule` if thermostat doesnt have `has_schedule` label!
NOTE: When not associated with Virtual Thermostat it will always work in `constant` mode.

remaining_time.description:
Remaining time until `time_limited` mode ends. Cannot be modified directly - use commands.
Unit: minutes.

target_temperature_minimum.description:
Lower limit of the target temperature. Could not be greater than maximum. Setting minimum value above target value, will also change target value to minimum.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `temperature_regulator`.

target_temperature_maximum.description:
Upper limit of the target temperature. Could not be less than minimum. Setting maximum below target, will also change target value to minimum.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `temperature_regulator`.

target_temperature_reached.description:
Controls device`s algorithm working state indicator. eg LED Diode. May be controlled by external algorithms or devices such as Thermostat.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `temperature_regulator`.

confirm_time_mode.description:
Mainly for Mobile/Web App purposes. Indicates if time mode modal should be displayed when changing thermostat temperature. Controlled by Virtual Thermostat.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `temperature_regulator`.

system_mode.description:
Current temperature regulator working mode.
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `temperature_regulator`.

energy_charged_total.description:
Total energy charged during device lifetime.
Unit: kWh, multiplied by 1000 (Wh).
Parameter available when custom device `variant` is set to `car_charger`.

Device.VIRTUAL.RelayIntegrator.description: Virtual relay integrator. Sets all associated relays in the same state when one changes state.

blind_duration.description: Duration when integrator ignores consecutive relay state changes. Unit: ms.

Device.VIRTUAL.BlindControllerIntegrator.description: The virtual blind controller intergrator allows setting the same target opening to all associated blind controllers. Control logic is one-way - If one of assigned blind controllers changes target opening, integrator will not affect target opening of the rest associated blind controllers.

last_set_target_opening.description:
Contains last set target opening via integrator.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `percent_opening_control` label is provided.

action_in_progress.description:
Indicates if control action requested via integrator is in progress.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `percent_opening_control` label is provided.

lift_position_description.description:
Describes lift position summary of associated blind controllers.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `percent_opening_control` label is provided.

blind_controllers.description: Optional. Blind Controllers that can be simultaneously controlled via integrator.

last_set_target_tilt.description:
Contains last set target tilt via integrator.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `percent_tilt_control` label is provided.

tilt_in_progress.description:
Indicates if tilt action requested via integrator is in progress.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `percent_tilt_control` label is provided.

tilt_position_description.description:
Describes tilt position summary of associated blind controllers.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `percent_tilt_control` label is provided.

Device.VIRTUAL.DimmerRgbIntegrator.description: The virtual dimmer/RGB controller intergrator allows setting the same state, brightness and color and all associated devices.

state.description: Current dimmers and RGB controllers state.

brightness.description:
Current brightness of dimmers and RGB controllers.
Range: 0-100

color_mode.description:
Current color mode of RGB controllers.
**NOTE:** Available only when device has label `rgb_support`

led_color.description:
Current LED color of RGB controllers.
**NOTE:** Available only when device has label `rgb_support`

white_temperature.description:
Current white temperature of RGB controllers. Unit: Kelvins
**NOTE:** Available only when device has label `rgb_support`

dimmers.description: Optional. Dimmers that can be simultaneously controlled via integrator.

rgb_controllers.description: Optional. RGB controllers that can be simultaneously controlled via integrator.

Device.VIRTUAL.HeatPumpManager.description: The virtual heat pump manager controls modbus heat pumps and domestic hot water devices. Reads temperature from associated temperature sensors and calculates heat or cool demand.

temperature.description:
Temperature value forwarded from associated sensor or 0 if no sensor associated or computed average temperature if more than one sensor associated.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

enabled.description: Enable or disable device.

work_mode.description: Current work mode algorithm.

target_temperature.description: Target temperature configuration.

current.description:
Current target temperature. This is read-only value. Use other target temperature properties to change value for specific work mode.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

heating.description:
Target temperature for heating work mode.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

cooling.description:
Target temperature for cooling work mode.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

automatic.description:
Target temperature for automatic work mode.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

schedule_id.description: ID of schedule associated with thermostat or null if schedule is not associated.

heating.description:
Hysteresis for heating work mode.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

cooling.description:
Hysteresis for cooling work mode.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

automatic.description:
Hysteresis for automatic work mode.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

enabled.description: Enable or disable domestic hot water control.

temperature.description:
Temperature value forwarded from DHW device built-in sensor.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

target_temperature.description:
Target temperature for DHW control.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

hysteresis.description:
Hysteresis for DHW control.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

state.description: Current working state of DHW control (Working/Idle)

heat_pump.description: Heat Pump that will be managed by this device.

domestic_hot_water.description: Optional. Domestic Hot Water that can be simultaneously controlled by Heat Pump Manager.

temperature_sensors.description: Atleast one required. Room temperature sensors used to control heat pump.

temperature_regulator.description: Temperature regulator associated with this device.

electric_heater_active.description: Indicates electric heater activation state in associated heat pump.

target_temperature_mode.description:
Device target temperature mode. Specifies if manager is working in `constant` mode with mode dependent temperature or according to schedule in `schedule` mode with many target temperatures in time, configured by user.
NOTE: Parameter cannot be `schedule` if device does not have `has_schedule` label!

Device.VIRTUAL.Gate.description: The virtual gate controls the sliding gate, swing gate or garage gate depending on configured variant (`sliding_gate`, `swing_gate`, `garage_gate`), using associated devices.

state.description: Current state of gate. No move and moving states are present only when there is no close status sensor associated, as device cannot determine physical state of the gate.

stopped_state.description: The state in which the gate was stopped.

partial_movement.description: Indicates if the current `state` is the result of partial move/open command

operating_logic.description:
Defines the operating logic of the gate controller with close status sensor.
**NOTE**: Cannot be changed if close status sensor is not associated.
`full_step_by_step` sequence: `opening` -> `stop (open)` -> `closing` -> `stop (open)` -> `opening`
`half_step_by_step` sequence: `opening` -> `stop (open)` -> `closing` -> `opening`

full_move_duration.description:
Maximum time in seconds required to fully close or fully open (select greater) the gate.
Unit: seconds

partial_move_duration.description:
Maximum time in seconds required to partial close or partial open (select greater) the gate.
**NOTE:** `partial_move_duration` cannot be greater than `full_move_duration`!
Unit: seconds

full_open_close_output.description: Commands the gate controller device to fully open or close gate depe1nding on current `state` by sending on/off impulse for 500ms.

partial_open_close_output.description: Optional. Commands the gate controller device to partially open or close gate depending on current `state` by sending on/off impulse for 500ms.

close_status_sensor.description: Optional. This is feedback device, detects physical gate `state` between open (open circuit = false) / closed (closed circuit = true)

trigger_sensors.description: Optional. This device can be used to catch external signal (eg. wall switch impulse, or RC remote output impulse) and trigger `full_move` action

buttons.description: Optional. This device can be used to catch button action events and trigger `full_move`/`partial_move` action

Device.VIRTUAL.Gate.ButtonAssociation.description: The virtual gate button association info with triggers configuration

full_open_close.description: Full open or full close command trigger configuration

Device.VIRTUAL.Wicket.description: The virtual wicket controls the electric strike of wicket or gate, using associated devices.

state.description: Current state of wicket. Open state is present only when there is close status sensor associated, as device can determine physical state of the wicket.

unlock_duration.description:
Time in seconds of electric strike output being active (buzzing).
Unit: seconds

electric_strike_output.description: Controls the electric strike locking and unlocking. This should be device of type `relay`, any class.

close_status_sensor.description: Optional. This is feedback device, detects physical wicket `state` between open (open circuit = false) / closed (closed circuit = true). This should be device of type `opening_sensor` or `two_state_input_sensor`, any class.

trigger_sensors.description: Optional. This device can be used to catch external signal (eg. wall switch impulse, or RC remote output impulse) and trigger `unlock` action. This should be device of type `oepning_sensor` or `two_state_input_sensor`, any class.

buttons.description: Optional. This device can be used to catch button action events and trigger `unlock` action

Maximum power that can be discharged to the grid.

charge_work_mode.description: Defines if battery charges or discharges according to schedule or manual control.

Protection functionality, that will set device state to off if there are communication problems.
Unit: minutes.

timeout_enabled.description: Indicates that timeout functionality is enabled.

backlight_mode.description: Buttons backlight mode. Parameter is optional. Available when backlight is supported - check if `has_backlight` label is provided.

backlight_brightness.description:
Buttons backlight brightness.
Paremeter hidden when backlight is unsupported.
Unit: %

backlight_idle_color.description:
HTML/Hex RGB representation of color when controller is in idle (inactive state).
Paremeter hidden when backlight is unsupported.

backlight_active_color.description:
HTML/Hex RGB representation of color when controller is active eg. motor is working.
Paremeter hidden when backlight is unsupported.

inverted.description: Indicates if should invert physical state of relay compared to represented state in application.

time_since_state_change.description:
Time since last relay state change.
Unit: seconds

startup_state.description:
State of output that should be set on device after power restart. Parameter is optional. Available when function is supported - check if `relay_startup_state_support` label is provided.
*NOTE*: cannot be changed when `work_mode` is set to `alarm_siren`.

work_mode.description: Relay working mode.

trigger_signal_type.description:
Selected device hardware trigger behavior. Impulse = (monostable trigger) impulse signal toggles the output state, state_change = (bistable trigger) when trigger state changes, output will be set equal to trigger signal.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `trigger_signal_config_support` label is provided.

allowed_trigger_signal_types.description:
List of available trigger signal types supported by the device. Allowed values to set in `trigger_signal_type` property.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `trigger_signal_config_support` label is provided.

temperature.description:
Measured temperature value.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

calibration.description:
Static point temperature calibration, used to adjust measurments.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

humidity.description:
Measured relative humidity value.
Unit: rH% with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

target_temperature.description:
Desired setpoint temperature, which device will try to achieve.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.
Minimum from parameter `target_temperature_minimum`, maximum from parameter `target_temperature_maximum`.

current.description:
Regulator target temperature mode. Specifies if regulator works in `constant` mode with one target temperature, `time_limited` mode with one temporary target temperature or according to schedule in `schedule` mode with many target temperatures in time, configured by user.
NOTE: Parameter is read only, use commands to change target temperature mode!
NOTE: Parameter cannot be `schedule` if thermostat doesnt have `has_schedule` label!
NOTE: When not associated with Virtual Thermostat it will always work in `constant` mode.

remaining_time.description:
Remaining time until `time_limited` mode ends. Cannot be modified directly - use commands.
Unit: minutes.

target_temperature_minimum.description:
Lower limit of the target temperature. Could not be greater than maximum. Setting minimum value above target value, will also change target value to minimum.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

target_temperature_maximum.description:
Upper limit of the target temperature. Could not be less than minimum. Setting maximum below target, will also change target value to minimum.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

target_temperature_reached.description: Controls device`s algorithm working state indicator. eg LED Diode. May be controlled by external algorithms or devices such as Thermostat.

confirm_time_mode.description: Mainly for Mobile/Web App purposes. Indicates if time mode modal should be displayed when changing thermostat temperature. Controlled by Virtual Thermostat.

user_menu_lock.description: Pin code information to lock regulators user menu. Parameter is optional. Available when user menu lock is supported - check if `user_menu_lock_support` label is provided.

Device.SBus.TwoStateInputSensor.description: Wired SBus Two State Input Sensor representation.

inverted.description: Indicates if physical state of input compared to represented state in application should be inverted.

raw_value.description: Raw value read from analog input.

value.description: Value from analog input after formula calculation or raw value when no formula specified.

formula.description:
Formula used to calculate value. In formula you can access all object parameters by calling *object.parameter_name*.
Should contain only calculations returning number. Should not contain any condition statements (excl. utils.ternary), loops and more complicated code.

target_level.description:
Desired light intensity level on which device is set or level on which device will be set when turned on. (depending on state)
Unit: %.

backlight_mode.description: Buttons backlight mode. Parameter is optional. Available when backlight is supported - check if `has_backlight` label is provided.

backlight_brightness.description:
Buttons backlight brightness.
Paremeter hidden when backlight is unsupported.
Unit: %

backlight_idle_color.description:
HTML/Hex RGB representation of color when controller is in idle.
Paremeter hidden when backlight is unsupported.

backlight_active_color.description:
HTML/Hex RGB representation of color when controller is active eg. motor is working.
Paremeter hidden when backlight is unsupported.

ambient_light_intensity.description:
Measured ambient light intensity.
Unit: %.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `has_backlight_brightness_sensor` label is provided.

output_temperature.description:
Measured temperature value of hardware output circuit.
Unit: \xB0C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `has_output_temperature_sensor` label is provided.

minimum.description:
Absolute minimum level that can be set on the device. Could not be larger than maximum.
Unit: %
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `level_calibration_support` label is provided.

maximum.description:
Absolute maximum level that can be set on the device. Could not be less than minimum.
Unit: %
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `level_calibration_support` label is provided.

switch_mode.description:
Depending on the value of this parameter, the swiches behavior will change. Can be modified with values from `allowed_switch_modes` property.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `switch_mode_support` label is provided.

allowed_switch_modes.description: List of available switch modes supported by the device. Allowed values to set in `switch_mode` property.

brightness.description: Desired brightness level on which device is set or level on which device will be set when turned on. (depending on state) Unit: %.

led_color.description: HTML/Hex RGB color that device will set on its output led strip.

white_temperature.description: Color temperature that device will set on its output led strip. Unit: Kelvins

color_mode.description: Color mode that device is set on.

led_strip_type.description: Led strip type that is connected with device. Needs to be set in order for device to display colors properly.

white_temperature_correction.description: White color temperature correction. Should be set on the value provided by led strip manufacturer. Available when led_strip_type set to rgbw.

cool_white_temperature_correction.description: Cool white color temperature correction. Should be set on the value provided by led strip manufacturer. Available when led_strip_type set to rgbww.

warm_white_temperature_correction.description: Warm white color temperature correction. Should be set on the value provided by led strip manufacturer. Available when led_strip_type set to rgbww.

available_animations.description: Animations styles that are available for device.

animations.description: Animations created by user that are available to run by device.

active_animation.description: Active animation id if animation was activated.

enabled.description: Enable or disable sensor. eg. If you want sense only at night time, you can setup automation to enable/disable sensor.

blind_duration.description:
Duration of sensor being off after detecting motion.
Unit: seconds

pulses_threshold.description:
Sensitivity factor. How many pulses from sensor are needed to treat action as motion.
*NOTE*: available when `sensor_type` is set to `pir`, i.e. device `variant` is `generic`.

pulses_window.description:
Sensitivity factor. Maximum time window in which {pulses_treshold} must occur to treat action as motion.
Unit: seconds
*NOTE*: available when `sensor_type` is set to `pir`, i.e. device `variant` is `generic`.

motion_detected.description:
Holds latest motion detection state. Remains `true` on motion detection and `false` when `blind_duration` time elapses.
**Notice**: the value will remain `true`` all the time when subsequent motion detections occur until motion stops.

time_since_motion.description:
Time since last motion detected.
Unit: seconds
**Notice**: -1 means not detected so far (motion didnt happen since system start).
**Notice**: This value will show 0 for each detected move, even if the previous one has not yet finished.

illuminance.description:
Measured light illuminance value.
Unit: lx.

pressure.description:
Measured pressure value.
Unit: hPa with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

altitude.description: Setting the altitude compensates the atmospheric pressure reading to the pressure at mean sea level, that is normally given in weather reports.

Device.SBus.IAQSensor.description: Wired SBus Indexed Air Quality Sensor representation.

iaq_accuracy.description: Index of Air Quality calculation accuracy

target_opening.description:
Desired setpoint opening, which device will try to achieve.
Unit: %.
**NOTE:** If device doesnt contain `percent_opening_control` label, target opening is limited to 0%, 50% or 100% (only these three).

window_covering_type.description: Defines the type of window covering the controller is connected to. Depending on the value of this parameter, the controller behavior will change and some parameters may be unavailable. Can be modified with values from `allowed_window_covering_types` property.

allowed_window_covering_types.description: List of available window covering types supported by the controller. Allowed values to set in `window_covering_type` property.

lift_control_mode.description: Defines the control algorithm of lifting movement. Depending on the value of this parameter, the controller behavior will change and some parameters may be unavailable. Can be modified with values from `allowed_lift_control_modes` property.

allowed_lift_control_modes.description: List of available lift control modes supported by the controller. Allowed values to set in `lift_control_mode` property.

target_tilt.description:
Desired tilt position
Unit: %.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `percent_tilt_control` label is provided.

current_tilt.description:
Current tilt position
Unit: %.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `percent_tilt_control` label is provided.

tilt_range.description:
Determines tilt range.
Unit: angle(degrees).
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `percent_tilt_control` label is provided.
Can be modified when: check if `window_covering_type` is `tilt_blind` or `pergola`. When `window_covering_type` is `tilt_blind` ONLY 90 and 180 are valid values.

full_cycle_duration.description:
Time required by motor to do full lift cycle from 100% to 0% or 0% to 100% (select larger). Proper full open or full close action is based on this value.
Unit: seconds
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `has_lift_duration` label is provided.
Can be modified when: check if `lift_control_mode` is `fixed_duration`.

tilt_duration.description:
Time required by motor to do full tilt cycle.
Unit: milliseconds
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `has_tilt_duration` label is provided.

tilt_cycle_distance.description: Number of motor steps to do full tilt cycle. Available when: check if `has_tilt_cycle_distance` label is provided.

motor_running_current_threshold.description:
Current threshold that indicates motor is running.
Unit: mA.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `has_motor_running_current_threshold` label is provided.

motor_overload_current_threshold.description:
Current threshold that indicates motor is overloaded / stalled.
Unit: mA.
Parameter is optional. Available when: check if `has_motor_overload_current_threshold` label is provided.

backlight_mode.description: Buttons backlight mode. Parameter is optional. Available when backlight is supported - check if `has_backlight` label is provided.

backlight_brightness.description:
Buttons backlight brightness.
Paremeter hidden when backlight is unsupported.
Unit: %

backlight_idle_color.description:
HTML/Hex RGB representation of color when controller is in idle (inactive state).
Paremeter hidden when backlight is unsupported.

backlight_active_color.description:
HTML/Hex RGB representation of color when controller is active eg. motor is working.
Paremeter hidden when backlight is unsupported.

value.description: Value of analog output in unit specified in `unit` property. Minimum value is set in property `value_minimum` and maximum value is set in property `value_maximum`.

raw_value.description: Raw value that is sent to analog output. Calculated automatically when changed value, based on minimum and maximum values.

unit.description: Value unit used by analog output.

Device.SBus.PulseWidthModulation.description: Wired SBus Pulse width modulation device representation.

frequency.description:
Frequency of pulse width modulation signal. Minimum frequency is set in property `frequency_minimum` and maximum frequency is set in property `frequency_maximum`.
Unit: Hz

frequency_minimum.description:
Lower limit of frequency.
Unit: Hz

frequency_maximum.description:
Upper limit of frequency.
Unit: Hz

duty_cycle.description:
Pulse width modulation duty cycle. The amount of time a digital signal is in the "active" state relative to the period of the signal.
Unit: %

Device.SBus.FloodSensor.description: Wired SBus Flood sensor device representation.

flood_detected.description: A flag representing the detection of flood / water leak by the sensor.

enabled.description: Indicates if valve is turned on.

open_percent.description:
Current opening percent.
Unit: % with two decimal numbers, multiplied by 100.

temperature_valve.description:
Current valve temperature.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

max_single_move.description:
The maximum percentage that the valve can open in one interval.

minimal_opening.description:
Minimum opening below which the valve cannot close further in its normal operation.

pause_time.description:
The pause time the valve takes after opening/closing during normal operation.

hysteresis.description:
Valve temperature hysteresis.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

proportional_gain.description: Specifies the response strength to temperature error.

opening_time.description:
The time it takes for the valve to open.
Unit: seconds

calibration_time.description:
The time it takes for the valve to open in calibration.
Unit: seconds

opening_time_mode.description:
Determines whether the calibration time differs from valve opening time in work.
Available when `has_opening_time_mode` label is provided.

floor_overheating_temperature.description:
The temperature after which the valve will close in floor heating mode.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

heat_source_protection.description:
Turns on/off the heating source protection.
Available when `heat_source_sensor_available` label is provided.

heat_source_protection_temperature.description:
The temperature after which the valve will open if heat source protection is enabeld.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

return_protection.description:
Turns on/off the return protection.
Available when `return_sensor_available` label is provided.

return_protection_temperature.description:
The temperature below which the valve will close if return protection is enabeld.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

central_heating_target_temperature.description:
Temperature setpoint that the device should maintain in heating as central heating valve.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

floor_heating_target_temperature.description:
Temperature setpoint that the device should maintain in heating as floor heating valve.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

cooling_target_temperature.description:
Temperature setpoint that the device should maintain in cooling mode.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

work_mode.description: Specify whether valve is used to heating or cooling.

emergency_behaviour.description: Specify valve behavior after communication loss.

valve_closes_from_pump_threshold.description:
Closes the valve when the pump operating conditions are not met.
Available when `heat_source_sensor_available` label is provided.

blockade.description: Specify whether valve blockade is on or off.

blockade_reasons.description: Specify the reason why the valve entered blockade state.

Device.SBus.ValvePump.description: Wired SBus Valve pump device representation.

state.description: Specify whether pump is working or not.

relay_control_mode.description: Specify whether the pump relay belongs to the internal valve algorithm or external entity.

emergency_behaviour.description: Specify pump behavior after communication loss if the pump relay control mode is internal.

pump_work_in_calibration.description:

blockade.description: Specify whether pump blockade is on or off.

target_temperature_minimum.description:

target_temperature_maximum.description:
Defines the absolute maximum target temperature for all profiles.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

target_temperature.description:
Defines the desired target temperature for the Comfort profile.

target_temperature_minimum.description:
Defines the minimum target temperature for the Comfort profile.

target_temperature_min.description:

target_temperature_min_minimum.description:

target_temperature_max.description:

target_temperature_max_maximum.description:

delta_temperature_minimum.description:
Delta determines the range of voltage for 0_10V valve. The farther the range is from the setpoint, the higher the voltage is.

Maximum value from `protection_profile.delta_temperature_maximum`.

delta_temperature_maximum.description:
Delta determines the range of voltage for 0_10V valve. The farther the range is from the setpoint, the higher the voltage is.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.
Minimum value from `protection_profile.delta_temperature_minimum`.

Device.CustomDeviceModule.TemperatureReg.description: Custom device module Temperature Regulator representation.

target_temperature.description:
Desired setpoint temperature, which device will try to achieve.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

current.description:
Regulator target temperature mode. Specifies if regulator works in `constant` mode with one target temperature, `time_limited` mode with one temporary target temperature or according to schedule in `schedule` mode with many target temperatures in time, configured by user.
NOTE: Parameter is read only, use commands to change target temperature mode!
NOTE: Parameter cannot be `schedule` if thermostat doesnt have `has_schedule` label!
NOTE: When not associated with Virtual Thermostat it will always work in `constant` mode.

remaining_time.description:
Remaining time until `time_limited` mode ends. Cannot be modified directly - use commands.
Unit: minutes.

target_temperature_minimum.description:
Lower limit of the target temperature. Could not be greater than maximum. Setting minimum value above target value, will also change target value to minimum.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

target_temperature_maximum.description:
Upper limit of the target temperature. Could not be less than minimum. Setting maximum below target, will also change target value to minimum.
Unit: C with one decimal number, multiplied by 10.

target_temperature_reached.description: Controls device`s algorithm working state indicator. eg LED Diode. May be controlled by external algorithms or devices such as Thermostat.

confirm_time_mode.description: Mainly for Mobile/Web App purposes. Indicates if time mode modal should be displayed when changing thermostat temperature. Controlled by Virtual Thermostat.

value.code:
switches={57,58}
changedSwitch = 0
for _, s in ipairs(switches) do
  if wtp[s]:changedValue("state") then
    changedSwitch = s
    break
  end
end

if changedSwitch ~= 0 then
  for _, s in ipairs(switches) do
    if s ~= changedSwitch then
      wtp[s]:setValue("state", wtp[changedSwitch]:getValue("state"))
    end
  end
end
